name: Death of the Rising Sun
description:
The year is 1941 and the world is at war. You play as a treasure hunter named William Hudson, who must fight his way across Egypt in both space and time. You must fight Egyptian forces, both new and old. You will venture though time tunnels, elaborate puzzle tombs, and lost ancient kingdoms to find and kill the evil ancient sun deity, Ra. This third-person puzzle action-adventure, keeps you on your toes with intense action, exotic locations, and a cinematic vision.

Death of the Rising Sun was created by a solo developer over several years of learning the Unreal Engine.
